directions: Microwave milk in an microwave-safe glass or bowl until almost boiling, about 1 minute 45 seconds.
Stir coffee mix, sugar, and chocolate mix together in a mug. Pour hot milk over coffee mixture and stir until mixture is dissolved.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon mocha-flavored instant coffee mix (such as International Coffee® Suisse Mocha)
1 teaspoon powdered chocolate drink mix (such as Nesquik®)
title: Instant Swiss Mocha Bliss
